scripts.setup:dev: cp .env.template .env.local && echo 'Please edit .env.local with your configuration'
scripts.admin:promote: node -e "const email = process.argv[1]; const token = process.env.ADMIN_TOKEN; if (!email || !token) { console.error('Usage: npm run admin:promote <email>'); process.exit(1); } fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/admin/promote-user', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ email, adminToken: token }) }).then(r => r.json()).then(console.log).catch(console.error);"
